mdRecord.dcterms:title: Sensuit la Resurrection de nostre Seigneur iesuchrist / par personnaiges ; comment il sapparut a ses appostres et a plusieurs autres, et comment il monta es cieulx le iour de son assention
Mistere de la resurrection de nostre seigneur Jesucrist
Resurrection de nostre Seigneur iesuchrist
mdRecord.dcterms:contributor: Douglas H. Gordon Collection of French Books (University of Virginia)
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Nouuellement imprime a Par s par Alai[n] Lotrian imprimeur & libraire demoura[n]t en la rue neufue nostre dame a lenseigne de lescu de France, xi
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Has been attributed to Arnoul Gréban and to Jean Michel.

Colophon: Cy finist le mistere de la resurrection de nostre seigneur Jesucrist par personnaiges. Nouuellement imprime a Paris par Alain Lotrian, Imprimeur et libraire demourant en la rue neufue nostre dame a lenseigne de lescu de France.
With printer's name on title page, and with the word "Resu" on first leaf of gathering B, and "Resur" on first leaf of gatherings C-L.
With woodcuts on title and on verso of last leaf.

SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Binder: Derome (with the leaves mounted on folio paper (28 cm.) within an ornamental border.Bookplate of Lucien-Graux. Also from the library of Gaignat and de Soleinne, according to bookseller's note which was laid in, but has now been placed in INSERT FILE under Gordon 1530 .M56 (AKX7415). Gordon Collection. Bookplate of Douglas Gordon. Gordon list, 669.

SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Binder: Derome (with the leaves mounted on folio paper (28 cm.) within an ornamental border.Bookplate of Lucien-Graux.
